H0.text: Seismic waves transmit the energy of an earthquake.

H1.text: Tectonic waves transmit the energy of an earthquake.

H2.text: Sonic waves are the type of waves that transmit the energy of an earthquake.

H3.text: Volcanic waves are the type of waves that transmit the energy of an earthquake.

A4.text: It can result from an earthquake

A5.text: Seismic waves are mechanical wave of acoustic energy that travels through the Earth or another planetary body.
